names.english: warm the liver and jing decoction
names.commonEnglish: Warm the Liver and Jing Decoction

actions: Warms the Kidneys, disperses Cold, spreads Liver Qi and alleviates pain.
Warms the Womb and warms and unblocks the Chong and Ren channels.
Eliminates Cold, promotes the movement of Qi, dissipates clumps and stops pain.
Disperses Cold and Stagnation, regulates Qi and stops pain.
With Ju He, for bulging disorders from Cold in the Liver Channel.
Drains Dampness and strengthens the Spleen.
Supplements the Liver, warms the Kidneys, fortifies Yang and astringes Jing.
Warms the Kidneys, strengthens Ming Men Fire, disperses deep Cold and warms the channels.
Tonifies the Kidneys, strengthens Yang and disperses Wind-Cold-Damp.
Tonifies the Kidneys, strengthens Yang and increases the libido.
Promotes the movement of Blood and invigorates the channels.
Dispels Wind, eliminates Dampness, relaxes the sinews, invigorates the collaterals and invigorates the Blood.

syndromes: Cold Stagnation in the Liver Channel

symptoms: Swelling and pain in scrotum as if the testicles were being pulled downward or
Contractions and Cold sensations of scrotum and testicles which are alleviated by warmth
Cold feeling in the lower body in general
Stuffiness in the chest and abdomen
Pain, distention, fullness and Cold sensation in lower abdomen
Dislike of Cold and a preference for warmth
manifestations.pulse: Deep and wiry or Slow or Deep and Excess or Deep and tight
